name: Sudden light blinds you.
description:
Closing your eyes shut doesn’t help–only gives the light bloodish tint, so you’re forced to use arms. It is also painfully silent and only the sound of your own breath reassures you that you haven’t gone deaf.
Minutes pass while the light slowly dies down until finally you are comfortable with opening your eyes. You find yourself standing before a giant crater; something in the centre of it emits daunting glow. Colors and light constantly change and paint the landscape in most unnatural ways. Rocks and debris are floating everywhere and you see tealish stones glowing in ground. You notice that the scenery is changing dramatically at the edge of your vision: land is sliding, structures move and crumble, scarecrows are being animated in the distance. Everything rapidly becomes a part of total chaos around.

effect.description: The slope is steep, but rocks and debris afford good enough footing to proceed safely.

resultIncident.name: The ground is shaking.
resultIncident.description: The first few steps go without incident, but soon you begin to notice that glowing stones under your feet are vibrating slightly. The further your go, the more noticeable are the vibrations. Soon it feels like the whole ground is shaking and maintaining balance becomes a challenge.

effect.description: Determined, you watch your step and continue your path to the glowing mystery in the centre of the crater. But suddenly, everything around you, including the stones you are standing on, rises up into the air, knocking you prone. Lying in dirt, you hastily try to get up–but instead one of the stones dashes and strikes you down with tremendous force. Sharp pain goes through your whole body and you fall again. Then another glowing rock hits you from above and you feel its weight pressing against you. Then another one does the same, and another, and another… Soon you can’t feel your own body, all your vision is dark and your breath is heavy and intermittent.

resultIncident.name: No hope.
resultIncident.description: You lie helplessly, unable to move.
